lead_paragraph: Ludovic Turpin of France won the fifth stage of the Dauphiné Libéré, and Levi Leipheimer of the United States retained the overall lead. Turpin finished the 96-mile ride from Sisteron to Briançon in 4 hours 6 minutes 49 seconds. Leipheimer leads Denis Menchov of Russia by 28 seconds. The race ends tomorrow.
